amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used for the planning, development, or construction of California State Route 710 freeway extension project through South Pasadena, California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used for the planning, development, or construction of California State Route 710 freeway extension project through South Pasadena, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
